analysis.summary: This email chain from September 2017 shows Jeffrey Epstein coordinating a meeting in New York while discussing political developments in the Gulf region, including commentary on Trump's foreign policy and references to Mohammed bin Salman (MBS) and potential diplomatic breakthroughs.
